ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, my prices are from the dwarves.  It could be the gnomes have a different price table.  I couldn t find the gnome steel plate merchant, and Ak kanon
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 1 Aug 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> When i got my steel plate, i made a gnome enchanter and poured all points to
> charisma. since a gnome was buying from gnomes, more charisma had no effect
> on prices. the breastplate was 768pp, and they rest were slightly less
> than your list as well.

Hmm, my prices are from the dwarves. It could be the gnomes
have a different price table. I couldn't find the gnome steel
plate merchant, and Ak'kanon gives me motion sickness so I
stuck with the dwarves. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
